page.title: 04CLUBS RAFFORD AREA
page.content: Girl Guides meet every Tuesday night at Mrs James's house. Cost is 15p per week. There are 15 guides and 3 guide leaders. They usually go camping every summer. Youth club is in the hall on Thursday nights. Cost is 20p.There are 40 members.Activities are disco dancing and games.There is a junior club for 12s and under on Thursdays. There are roughly 20 members. They pay 20p and play games.The indoor bowls are on Thursdays you pay 50p if you bring your own bowls and Â£1.00 to borrow bowls. They meet in the hall and is mostly for elderly people. Aerobics is held every Wednesday morning.They exercise to make themselves slim.It's usually for people who are over weight. They pay Â£1.00 and it is held in the hall.There are 15 members.
